str2: A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Neuter of a presumed derivative of arguros; silvery, i.e. cash; specially, a silverling.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
Probably contracted from tessares and peze; a table or stool, usually for food; also a counter for money.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: To also, I too, but I. From kai and ego; so also the dative case kamoi, and accusative case kame and I, me.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To do, perform, accomplish; be in any condition, i.e. I fare; I exact, require.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Neuter 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
With. A primary preposition denoting union; with or together.
Interest, usury. From the base of tikto; interest on money loaned.
